abstract.p: List of recent residential sale prices in New York City and metropolitan area; photos; graphs of mortgage rates (S)

block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$450,000 211 East 18th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, windowed kitchen, upgraded appliances, high ceilings, h/w floors; maintenance $820, 55% tax-deductible; listed at $450,000, 1 week on market (Brokers: Corcoran Group; Citi Habitats)

$699,000 119 East 10th Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; windowed kitchen, beamed ceilings, 2 fireplaces, wide-plank floors, 2 exposures, common gardens; maintenance $735, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $699,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Bellmarc)

$990,000 200 East 89th Street (Monarch) 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,000-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors, balcony, Central Park view; common charges $1,152; taxes $10,332; listed at $1.1 million, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$695,000 202 West 78th Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a town house; dining area, eat-in kitchen, marble baths, cedar closet, fireplace, 3 exposures, common roof deck; maintenance $768, 46% tax-deductible; listed at $695,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

$550,000 318 West 100th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; dining room, windowed kitchen, high ceilings, h/w floors; common charges $410; taxes $1,536; listed at $585,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Manhattan Apartments)

$275,000 750 Kappock Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, h/w floors, terrace, west exposure; maintenance $821, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $275,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: John Edwards Real Estate)

$180,000 160 Columbia Heights 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; part-time doormen, sunken living room, h/w floors, 2 exposures, partial East River view; maintenance $900, includes gas and electricity, 62% tax-deductible; listed at $180,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Harbor View)

$305,750 340 11th Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,800-sq.-ft. quadriplex condo in a 10-year-old building; elevator, dining area, h/w floors, terrace, Manhattan skyline view; common charges $291; 100% tax abatement; listed at $305,750, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Heights Berkeley)

$155,000 135 Prospect Park Southwest 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 900-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; entry foyer, eat-in kitchen, high ceilings; maintenance $328, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $170,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Brooklyn Bridge Realty)

$330,000 160-36 27th Avenue 4-bedroom, 4-bath, 65-year-old aluminum and brick-sided Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 1-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,114; listed at $339,888, 13 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

$310,000 66-47 Saunders Street 60-year-old 2-family attached brick house; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in each unit; finished basement, 1-car garage, 16-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,100; listed at $320,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Advantage Forest Hills)

$333,000 737 Klondike Avenue 29-year-old 2-family detached aluminum and stone-sided high-ranch; 3 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, dining room, dinette, terrace in primary unit; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in other; finished basement, 1-car garage, 40-by-115-ft. lot; taxes $1,635; listed at $359,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Salmon)

$359,000 77 Hickory Hill Drive 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 32-year-old raised ranch; foyer, cathedral ceilings, dining room, hardwood floors, eat-in kitchen, skylight, deck, 2-car garage, 60-by-200-ft. lot; taxes $7,983; listed at $359,000, 12 weeks on market (Brokers: Cardinal Realty Associates; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$102,000 140 North Broadway 2-bedroom, 1-bath co-op in a 44-year-old building; entry hall, dining area, parquet floors, deck, storage room, laundry room; maintenance $598, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $106,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Ragette)

$342,500 135 Oakland Avenue 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 70-year-old colonial; covered porch, fireplace, dining room, modern eat-in kitchen, den, mud room, skylights, 3-car garage, 63-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $8,800; listed at $369,000; 19 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Ragette)

$453,000 6 Brooklands 4-bedroom, 3-bath co-op in a prewar building; foyer, fireplace, eat-in kitchen, dining room, library, maid's room, storage room, laundry room; maintenance $1,175, 37% tax deductible; listed at $495,000, 17 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; Bronxville-Ley)

$498,000 5 Woodhollow Lane 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 17-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, finished basement, 2 fireplaces, 2-car garage, 1-acre lot; taxes $9,600; listed at $498,000, 7 days on market (Broker: Anastasio)

$245,000 46 Woolsey Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 50-year-old brick ranch; eat-in kitchen, oak floors, den, basement, deck, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,500; listed at $269,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Harmonious Homes)

$1.9 million 146 Grist Mill Lane 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 47-year-old expanded ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, maid's quarters, fireplace, 2-car attached garage, water views, 1.3-acre lot; taxes $15,000; listed at $2 million, 28 weeks on market (Broker: June Shapiro)

$215,000 6 Owls Nest Lane 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 12-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, family room, fireplace, 2-car garage, 3.16-acre lot; taxes $3,327; listed at $212,900 (multiple bids), 10 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$675,000 40 Old Orchard Road 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 29-year-old contemporary; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, library, 2 fireplaces, guest suite, c/a, h/w floors, 2-car garage, 2-acre lot; taxes $6,938; listed at $699,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: William Pitt)

$517,000 12 Broad Axe Lane 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 35-year-old colonial; renovated eat-in kitchen and baths, family room, screened porch, semifinished basement, 2-car garage, 1-acre lot; taxes $5,352; listed at $495,000 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Wilton; Van Slyck Associates)

$968,900 7 Zak Hill Drive 5-bedroom, 2-year-old colonial with 3 full and 2 half baths; spiral staircase, dining room, eat-in kitchen, 3 fireplaces, two 2-car garages, 1.93-acre lot; taxes $18,308; listed at $1.189 million, 1 year on market (Brokers: William Orange Realty/ Sotheby's; Prudential Connecticut)

$539,000 77 Arcadia Road 5-bedroom, 3-bath, 45-year-old split-level; h/w floors, fireplace, patio, deck, 2-car garage, 132-by-200-ft. lot; taxes $8,622; listed at $559,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Abbott & Caserta)

$329,900 34 River Bend Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 20-year-old colonial; family room with fireplace, patio, enclosed porch, 2-car garage, 0.69-acre lot; taxes $5,556; listed at $329,900, 3 months on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

$445,000 58 De Normandie 6-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 125-year-old Victorian; h/w floors, open front porch, deck, 2-car garage, 63-by-148-ft.lot; taxes $5,963; listed at $439,000, (multiple bids) 1 day on market (Broker: Weichert)
